scripts.start:bun-serve: SET NODE_ENV=production & SET PORT=3001 & bun ssr/server.bun-serve.js
scripts.start:bun-http: SET NODE_ENV=production & SET PORT=3001 & bun ssr/server.http.js
scripts.start:node-http: SET NODE_ENV=production & SET PORT=3001 & node ssr/server.http.js
scripts.start:node-uws: SET NODE_ENV=production & SET PORT=3001 & node ssr/server.uws.js
